WorkItem.Description:
After I got i390 LFR version of that staff, Rawr have been superslow on that toon (Beeq @ EU-Arathor).
On my other toons, without the staff, Rawr is smooth and fast as known. (i7+16gigs of mem)
WorkItem.Summary: Ti'tahk, the Steps of Time - makes Rawr crawl.

Comments.Message: It'd help if you told us which class and spec, at least.

Arcane (32/2/7) Gnome Mage.

Sorry I thought they would load up the toon before troubleshooting so I didn't mention it.
http.//eu.battle.net/wow/en/character/arathor/beeq/simple
It's happening because you have 2 haste procs items. If it's too slow disable cycle level haste procs in advanced options (it shouldn't matter much for arcane).
